title: Analysis of an exponential function part - d

content.description: Let F be the function defined by f(x) = 2xe−x for all real numbers x.
content.question: Using the results found in parts (a), (b), and (c), sketch the graph of y = f(x) in the xy-plane provided below.

frqParts.text: Using the results found in parts (a), (b), and (c), sketch the graph of y = f(x) in the xy-plane provided below.

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
